Title: The Greatest Showman (2017)
Filming Locations: 1 E 78th St, New York City, New York, USA
Production Co: Chernin Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Twentieth Century Fox
Trivia: a Both Hugh Jackman (P.T. Barnum) and Shuler Hensley (Lead Protestor) were cast members of the 1999 London West End revival of Oklahoma, as Curly and Jud Fry, respectively. The pair were also cast in Van Helsing as Van Helsing and the Frankenstein Monster, respectively.
Goofs: s A ruffian calls a black man a "spook," a racial slur not attested before the 1940s, nearly 100 years after the film setting.
Crazy Credits: s If you look closely at the early end title cards, the small graphics in the corners of the cards reflect the roles of both the cast and crew.
